AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented alien: individual being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nine undocumented aliens: group of nine undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.seven other undocumented aliens: additional group of seven undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: total number of undocumented immigrants in the group, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling, transported in an extended cab pickup truck for financial gain, lacking proper food supplies and insulated clothing, facing severe weather conditions including low temperatures and potential rain, with inadequate water and food provisions, and being transported unrestrained in the bed of a pickup truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: alien smuggler guide responsible for creating substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury to the undocumented aliens during the smuggling journey through South Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the smuggling incident occurred and where Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero was held responsible
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas Trek: location of the smuggling journey guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero
